Nerdiest Birthday Ever

Blog Logo

on 10 May 2014



read

So yesterday, May 9th, was my birthday and my good people at work made it really special. Below are some of the nerdiest messages that I got. I just love my folks. They know how to make me smile. Enjoy.

Tega

while( time() <= mktime(23,59,59,05,09,2014)
{
    happyBirthdayCelestine();
}

Oladayo Raji

Happy Birthday Bro. More Python to your brain

Abiola Ibrahim

for time.Now().Unix() > 1399622838 && time.Now().Unix() < 1399709236 {
    fmt.Printf("Happy Birthday %s %s %n", "Celestine", "Omin")
}
//Don't ask me which Language.

Adeyemi Olaoye

Obasa Adegoke The Terminal god and earlang show-off

$ vim happy_birthday.erl

% happy birthday program
-module(happy_birthday).
-export([start/0]).

start() ->
    io:fwrite("Happy Birthday BOSS!!!\nMore Codes To Your Gloves. God Bless You"). % :) :D

Oyewale Oyediran The Scalability buff

Yours truly
Celestine Omin The Bash wannabe
